videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Play this deck before it gets banned
videos.description:
This Brawl deck features Ugin, Eye of the Storms as it's commander and it is a ton of fun on MTG Arena.

RSVP to win free Tarkir packs: https://www.dripshop.live/streams/cgbdragonstorm?referral=CovertGoBlue

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/HQT6guPUyk6XULRP---svg

Sponsors

CoolStuffInc.com Promo Code CGB5 - https://www.coolstuffinc.com/cgb
Dragon Shield Coupon Code CGB5 - https://dragonshield.com/?ref=CGB
DripShop.live - https://join.dripshop.live/CovertGoBlue
Moxfield - https://www.moxfield.com/users/CovertGoBlue

Join the Tarkir: Dragonstorm giveaway stream - We are giving away 24 Tarkir: Dragonstorm Collector Booster Packs!
https://www.dripshop.live/streams/cgbdragonstorm?referral=CovertGoBlue

I will be a special guest at CoolStuffCon - Get tickets here
https://coolstuffevents.com/

videos.title: Dimir Dragons take control of the ladder!
videos.description:
